item.title: Tom Basden Wants the Heartwarming Success of ‘The Ballad of Wallis Island’ to Give British Indie Filmmakers Hope
item.description: The British actor-writer speaks to THR about filming the indie in just 18 days, how getting Carey Mulligan to star boosted their confidence, and what him and Tim Key have planned for their next projec
